title: Remove GeoHashField from Solr
description: I'd like to remove GeoHashField from Solr – 7.0.  I see no use-case for it any more.  And it's presence is distracting from spatial fields you should be using.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Yep, just noticed that when I went to lose 9609. I'm batting 1,000 on committing lately.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: David Smiley - You deprecated this field with SOLR-10729. Should this be closed as a duplicate? or do you need it open to remove the fields from master for 8.0?

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: It's debatable but I'll close as a duplicate.  When we're ready to remove deprecated stuff from 8.0, we'll file an issue larger in scope than this one field.
